00106 // inline methods

00108 inline double CScaleCalibration::GetScaleFactor() const
00109 {
00110        return m_scaleFactor;
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 inline void CScaleCalibration::SetScaleFactor(double value)
00115 {
00116        if (m_scaleFactor != value){
00117               istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(this);
00118        
00119               m_scaleFactor = value;
00120        }
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 inline const i2d::CVector2d& CScaleCalibration::GetViewCenter() const
00125 {
00126        return m_viewCenter;
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 inline void CScaleCalibration::SetViewCenter(const i2d::CVector2d& center)
00131 {
00132        if (m_viewCenter != center){
00133               istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(this);
00134 
00135               m_viewCenter = center;
00136        }
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 inline bool CScaleCalibration::IsIdentity() const
00141 {
00142        return (m_viewCenter.GetLength2() < I_EPSILON) &&
00143                      (qAbs(m_scaleFactor) < I_EPSILON);
00144 }
